name: Sarah L., Charlottesville
review: Dani Cleans handles both our house cleaning and yard work. It's so convenient having one company for everything. They're always on time and the results speak for themselves.

name: Marcus T., Albemarle County
review: We hired them for a move-out clean and they left the place spotless. Our landlord returned the full deposit. Highly recommend to anyone moving in the Charlottesville area!

name: Jennifer K., Crozet
review: Our lawn has never looked better. They're consistent, thorough, and the price is fair. We've been using them for 6 months now and couldn't be happier.

name: David & Lisa R., Belmont
review: We switched from a national franchise and the difference is night and day. Dani Cleans actually listens to what we need. Our bi-weekly cleaning is the highlight of the week.

name: Amanda P., Keswick
review: They did a full spring cleanup on our 2-acre property â€” leaf removal, mulching, bed edging, the works. Looked like a completely different yard. Already booked for fall cleanup.

name: Tom W., Downtown Charlottesville
review: Professional, reliable, and they actually show up when they say they will. The deep clean they did on our rental property was impressive. Tenants were thrilled.

name: Rachel M., Earlysville
review: I love that they use eco-friendly products. With two toddlers and a dog, that matters to us. The house smells fresh without any harsh chemicals. Best cleaning service we've tried.

name: Carlos G., Barracks Road
review: Great communication from start to finish. They gave us a fair quote, showed up on time, and did excellent work on both the inside cleaning and lawn maintenance. Five stars all around.
